text:
accelerometer data is fed into separate convolutional layers, pooling layers, then concatenated
before being interpreted by hidden fully connected layers. The ﬁgure below taken from the
paper clearly shows the topology of the model. It provides a good template for how the CNN
may be used for HAR problems and time series classiﬁcation in general.
